Here's the thing you don't seem to comprehend:
The people you get matched with, both allies and enemies, are all picked from the exact same pool of players. Given that, the teams you vs are just as likely, if not more, to have "bad team mates" as your team. Given that, the chance that "bad team mates" actually affect your rank in the long run is negligible, at best, and if they do it's more likely to be a positive influence for you, bringing you higher than you should be.

But then again, that's assuming you're not a "bad team mate" so maybe it's time for you to take a good long look in the mirror and figure out what you are doing that's holding you back instead of crapping on using the same bullsh!t excuse as millions of other people.
